entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Sundre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sundre Airport 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
